notes: often used as a mass noun
idiomatic in expressions like "fa un freddo"

example_sentence_english: The cold gets into the house.

example_sentence_italian: I freddi di gennaio sono duri.
example_sentence_english: The cold spells in January are harsh.

example_sentence_italian: Ci sono dei freddi strani quest'anno.
example_sentence_english: There are some strange cold spells this year.
I am afraid of the cold.
Do not stay to the cold.

example_sentence_english: We are not ready for the mountain cold spells.

example_sentence_italian: Le mani mi fanno male dal freddo.
example_sentence_english: My hands hurt from the cold.
We protect ourselves from the night cold spells.
I walk in the cold in silence.

example_sentence_italian: Nei freddi di gennaio resto a casa.
example_sentence_english: In the cold spells of January I stay home.
